#summary Rules for the War and each Battle
#labels Phase-Requirements,Phase-Design

= Rules for the War =


= Rules for each Battle =

  * time for matches
    * minimum time (to allow teams to prepare for the match)
    Each match should be announced with enough time for both teams to prepare a roster.
    * maximum time
    The attacked team can delay the match one week without a reason. The system must provide a mechanism to allow clan managers to comunicate this decisions.

  * map-choice
  A fixed map will be choosen based on the territory being attacked.
